about_the_game:
Step into the darkness of the Fukushima Asylum where the walls whisper forgotten secrets, and every shadow hides a threat. Tenshi is an intense, bodycam-style horror experience that plunges you into a world of paranoia, desperation, and fear. Explore the eerie halls of an abandoned asylum, uncover its chilling history, and survive against relentless enemies that only move when you aren’t looking.

Features:

  • Immersive Bodycam Perspective: Experience every pulse-pounding moment through the lens of a gritty, first-person bodycam. The limited field of view and shaky realism pull you deeper into the terror.

  • Terrifying Enemies: Beware the “Weeping Angels,” lifelike statues that stalk you relentlessly. They move only when you can’t see them—look away, and they close in. Keep your wits sharp and your gaze sharper.

  • NPCs: Encounter your colleague outside of the asylum to lead you inside where you will uncover your true fate.

  • Atmospheric Sound Design: Hear every creak, whisper, and footstep as the school comes alive around you. Dynamic, binaural audio heightens your sense of isolation and dread.

  • Puzzles and Exploration: Navigate dark hallways, creepy bedrooms, and locked offices to find clues and solve puzzles. Each discovery brings you closer to the truth—or deeper into the nightmare.

Prepare to test your courage and your instincts. The asylum doesn’t want you to leave, and the angels are always watching. Can you make it out alive, or will you become another forgotten soul trapped in the shadows?

Dare to look. Dare to blink. Dare to play.

Wishlist now to step into the nightmare!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains dead bodies and unsettling hostiles

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 5600 RTX 3060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 5700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 7700 RTX 4070
